Title: reanimated Monster Mash-Up
Description:
Compilation mod pack for the {{Y|Caves of Qud Modding Jam: reanimated Monster Mash}}, which ran at the start of November 2025. See all the entries at {{C|https://itch.io/jam/caves-of-qud-modding-jam-4/entries}}!

Use the in-game wish menu (Debug > Wish Menu) for easy wishing for the pack's contents.

{{W|Warning:}} Do not run this pack simultaneous with any of the mods contained within.

{{y|You imbued a hideous specimen with life, again. Why?}}
Author: Mod Jam Participants and Organizers
